# Individual Cell Styling

TeXnative supports per-cell background and text colors using Excel-style addressing (A1, B2, etc.).

## Basic Cell Background Color

Highlight specific cells with `tbl-cells`:

| Feature    | Status   | Priority |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Auth       | Complete | High     |
| API        | In Work  | Medium   |
| Docs       | Pending  | Low      |

: Features with highlighted status {#tbl-basic-bgcolor tbl-cells="{B1: {bgcolor: '#e0e0e0'}, B2: {bgcolor: '#90EE90'}, B3: {bgcolor: '#FFD700'}, B4: {bgcolor: '#FFB6C1'}}"}

## Cell Text Color

Change text color in specific cells:

| Metric     | Value    | Trend    |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Revenue    | $10.5M   | Up       |
| Costs      | $8.2M    | Down     |
| Profit     | $2.3M    | Up       |

> `: Metrics with colored trends {#tbl-txtcolor tbl-cells="{C2: {txtcolor: '#006400'}, C3: {txtcolor: '#8B0000'}, C4: {txtcolor: '#006400'}}"}`

## Combined Background and Text Colors

Apply both colors to the same cell:

| Component  | Health   | Action   |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Database   | Critical | Restart  |
| Cache      | Warning  | Monitor  |
| API        | OK       | None     |

: System health with combined styling {#tbl-combined tbl-cells="{B2: {bgcolor: '#DC143C', txtcolor: '#FFFFFF'}, B3: {bgcolor: '#FFA500', txtcolor: '#000000'}, B4: {bgcolor: '#228B22', txtcolor: '#FFFFFF'}}"}

## Multiple Cells Styled

Style multiple cells across the table:

| Q1         | Q2       | Q3       | Q4       |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|:---------|
| $2.1M      | $2.3M    | $2.0M    | $2.8M    |
| $1.8M      | $1.9M    | $2.1M    | $2.2M    |

: Quarterly data with highlights {#tbl-multi tbl-cells="{A1: {bgcolor: '#4169E1', txtcolor: '#FFFFFF'}, D1: {bgcolor: '#4169E1', txtcolor: '#FFFFFF'}, D2: {bgcolor: '#90EE90'}, C3: {bgcolor: '#FFB6C1'}}"}

## Cell Styling with Multi-Row Headers

When using `tbl-header-rows`, row numbering is unified (header rows are 1, 2, etc.):

| Category   | 2023     | 2024     |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Revenue    | $50M     | $65M     |
| Expenses   | $40M     | $45M     |
| Net Income | $10M     | $20M     |

: Multi-row header example {#tbl-multirow tbl-header-rows="1" tbl-cells="{B4: {bgcolor: '#90EE90'}, C4: {bgcolor: '#90EE90'}}"}

## Cell Styling Precedence

Cell styles override section-level styles (tbl-header-bgcolor, tbl-body-bgcolor):

| Item       | Count    | Total    |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Widgets    | 100      | $500     |
| Gadgets    | 50       | $750     |

: Precedence demo - A2 overrides body color {#tbl-precedence tbl-body-bgcolor="#E6E6FA" tbl-cells="{A2: {bgcolor: '#FFD700'}, A3: {bgcolor: '#FF6347'}}"}

## RGB Color Format

Colors can also be specified in RGB format:

| Name       | Role     | Team     |
|:-----------|:---------|:---------|
| Alice      | Lead     | Alpha    |
| Bob        | Dev      | Beta     |

: RGB color example {#tbl-rgb tbl-cells="{B2: {bgcolor: '100,149,237'}, C3: {bgcolor: '255,182,193'}}"}
